overview: It’s New Year’s Day and our cast of characters (a businessman, his younger wife and two ex-wives) are nursing hangovers and trying to piece together what happened the night before. Through a series of flashbacks, we learn that partying and hyperactive libidos were responsible for shredded business documents, a facial tattoo and wild, no-holds barred sex! Funny, Irreverent and Hot as Hell … RSVP today for The Party!
title: The Party
